title: Country name
description: The name of country where the entity is based

metadata.purpose: A free form field to enter a country's name. The Index will try to match that text to a country's name and will store the country's ISO code in the Index database to enable searching by country for the entity. The name-to-ISO mapping is here: https://github.com/MurmurationsNetwork/MurmurationsLibrary/blob/main/countries/map.json
